programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.desc: Ollie is scared out of his wits when he comes face to face with a simple spider. Afraid of looking cowardly, he exaggerates and lies to his friends about how dangerous it is. Soon enough, his lie snowballs and leads to chaos. Will Ollie be able to protect his friends and face his fear once and for all? Sloppy doesn't want to put in the time to study for his test on animals. Instead, he builds a machine that will put the facts directly into his brain.

programme.title: Creative Galaxy
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Arty and his sidekick Epiphany, as they search the galaxy to solve creative problems with art!

programme.title: Little Tami's Book
programme.desc: A chance encounter with Sister Kate, a social worker who used to help Hebe, sparks curiosity about the work of a Social Worker. They travel to Booky's academy to learn from Sajahan, the social worker.

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment starring Cookie Monster in "Cookie Monster's Foodie Truck". And look out for special guest appearances by international Sesame Street characters Chamki (from Galli Galli Sim Sim), Lily (from Zhima Jie: Da Niao Kan Shijie) and Zuzu (from Takalani Sesame).

programme.title: Becca's Bunch
programme.desc: Russell asks for the biggest nut in Wagtail Woods for his birthday present, so the Bunch must figure out how to reach a coconut and get it to The Clubhouse before his party.

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.sub-title: Best Birthday Gift Ever-The Giant Baby
programme.desc: It's Mr Merchant's birthday and wished for his broken shelf to be fixed. Mr Mechanic decides that his brother deserves a better gift and got the help of the children to create something 'perfect'. Will Mr Merchant be happy with his gift? The children are tasked with caring for a lost baby alien. Astrid gets impatient and the baby ran away! She has to patiently coax the baby alien back to safety.

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.sub-title: Fairy Happy Thanksgiving! - Cricket's the Boss!
programme.desc: Animated series about a fairy and her adventures running a neighborhood cafe with her friends.

programme.title: Esme And Roy
programme.desc: Meet Esme & Roy - they're best friends and the best monstersitters in Monsterdale!

programme.title: Rev & Roll
programme.desc: Rev & Roll follows the adventures of eight-year-old Rev and his best friend Rumble - a rambunctious truck with all the personality of a loyal and enthusiastic dog!

programme.title: Royal India
programme.desc: Samira returns to India, this time in search of culinary secrets from India's Royal families. She travels to fabulous palaces, meets Kings and Princesses, and cooks with Royal chefs to bring you their favourite dishes.

programme.title: Rachel Allen's Cake Diaries
programme.desc: Cake is about so much more than the traditional celebrations we all recognise. It shouldn't be confined to birthdays and anniversaries. A great cake has a part to play in everyday life. In this super-stylish yet personal series, chef Rachel Allen flicks through her diary where a range of life events, from a big family occasion to something as simple as a change in the weather, inspires a cake to compliment the moment.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune
programme.desc: Hosted by Pat Sajak, this game show features 3 contestants who try to solve a puzzle by spinning the wheel and guessing letters in a word or phrase.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Towkay Heng is humiliated when he finds out just how widespread his secret is. Pei Ling threatens Hafiq to make good on his contract. Christine has a hard time getting through to Damien.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Mdm Chia's daughter hints at Bhaskar's negligence that killed her mother in her blog. Love continues to blossom between Diana and Jay as they enjoy being a couple. Meanwhile, Bhaskar grows increasingly uncomfortable with Meera working for Joel.

programme.title: RenovAID
programme.desc: Sathiya's home has not been renovated for 10 years. For this single-income earner, any costly house maintenance has to be put on the back burner. This is especially so after a series of unexpected events.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Before taking a nap, Grizzy locks the food cupboard to prevent the Lemmings from getting into it. And to be sure they cannot force the lock, Grizzy throws all the house tools into the ravine. The Lemmings find a crate of mini building-blocks which enables them to build a hammer... and any other object they wish!

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings' clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Wild Kratts
programme.desc: Join the Kratt Brothers in a new season of WILD KRATTS, the fun and fact-packed series!

programme.title: Xavier Riddle And The Secret Museum
programme.desc: Come along with Xavier Riddle, the most effusive pint-sized history adventurer; Yadina, his effervescent little sister; and his brilliant best friend Brad, as they unravel the secrets of world famous heroes from history!

programme.title: Regal Academy - Second Series
programme.desc: Our heroes are spending a few days at IronFan castle to learn LingLing's family traditions. But a mysterious shadow warrior attacks them during the night, stealing the IronFan family item. Rose and her friends set a trap to capture the warrior, and find out she is very similar to granny IronFan. LingLing is worried: what's happening inside her grandma's castle?

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: After releasing the Trix from their space-time prison, Valtor asks for the three witches' help to get the Wishing Star. Meanwhile, at Alfea, Twinkly visits the Winx. The rulers of Lumenia - Argen and Dorana - need their help: with their powers, the fairies will enter the Starcase, but there, unexpectedly, they will be attacked by the Trix...

programme.title: Before I Was Awesome
programme.desc: An uncool geek from a cool family of magicians figures out what it takes to fit in at home and in school.

programme.title: The Wall UK
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune
programme.desc: Hosted by Pat Sajak, this game show features 3 contestants who try to solve a puzzle by spinning the wheel and guessing letters in a word or phrase.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Ibrahim struggles to cope with the news of Nooraini's diagnosis. Nelly manages to convince Towkay Heng to go for a medical check-up. Meanwhile, Violet goes missing.

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce South East Asia
programme.desc: In the 1970's Cambodia was a blossoming country. Its capital Phnom Penh was often called the Pearl of SouthEast Asia and like many countries, 'Rock n Roll' had arrived and music was the soul of the nation and its youth. Then one day, the music stopped. Cambodia found itself in a civil war under the communist Pol Pot Regime. About a third of its population was murdered. Musicians, artists, and the educated were targeted as the Regime perceived them to have western values.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Crimewatch
programme.desc: A fatal hit-and-run accident with nothing more than pieces of broken vehicle fragments left behind. Watch how officers from the Traffic Police conducted extensive ground investigations and trawled thorough hours of CCTV footage to establish the identity of the suspect. The suspect was eventually arrested by the Police within 24 hours of the reported crime. In this episode, we share tips on how to safeguard yourself against Government Official Impersonation scams.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: FBI: MOST WANTED is a high-stakes drama that focuses on the Fugitive Task Force, an elite unit that relentlessly pursues and captures the notorious criminals on the Bureau's Most Wanted list. The team heads to D.C. to protect Ortiz's former informant after a hitman tries to kill her. Also, Sarah helps Jess' family prepares for Byron and Marie's last-minute wedding on Jess' farm.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O
programme.sub-title: When the sea draws out the tidal wave, the rocks where the cowries hide are exposed
programme.desc: The series covers the actions of an elite task force in Hawaii who are able to investigate crimes ranging from terrorism to kidnapping as well as murder and robberies headed by Steve McGarrett. The whole island is collapsing under a heat wave. Lots of people running wild and Danny and Steve are chasing a murderer.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Ibrahim struggles to cope with the news of Nooraini's diagnosis. Nelly manages to convince Towkay Heng to go for a medical check-up. Meanwhile, Violet goes missing.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.sub-title: What Makes a Good Post Apocalyptic Movie, Speilberg Films, Idris Elba
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: Whether to commemorate a memory or to make a bold statement, tattoos has become one of the most creative ways for people to express themselves. However, these modern day body modifications do carry risks. In this episode, we see how a young man's quest to win favour with a girl by getting a tattoo, goes terribly wrong when he gets infected by the tattoo ink. And a young woman with a heart murmur suffers the ill fate when she had a tattoo done during an intoxicated moment.

programme.title: Hotspots: The Last Hope
programme.desc: Our planet is abundant with life. But in some places where there is an especially large variety of animal and plant species, there is also a high level of habitat destruction. These are areas that demand special protection: the Hotspots of biodiversity. In recent years, three species are driven to extinction every day. Scientists have found a solution: we must preserve the Hotspots.

Chris discovers a myriad of animals in the wild, including an up, close and personal encounter with a Boyd's Forest Dragon, a jungle carpet python, rhinoceros beetles, and the greatest find of all: a rare wild tree kangaroo.

programme.desc: After learning about outer space from Bibi and the kidlings, Hiccup and Sneeze are eager to explore it. Bibi makes them a cardboard rocket ship and they blast off, landing on a star and meeting an alien on their space adventure.

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train
programme.desc: Titipo meets Manny, the freight train, who is new to Train Village. After talking to him, Titipo thinks Manny is a brave and hearty train. Titipo goes back to Train Village and tells everyone what a great train he thinks Manny is. Hearing this, everyone is curious about Manny. However, Manny is completely different from how Titipo described him.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo discovers that a satin bowerbird has been stealing blue objects from him and his family. Realising that the satin bowerbird might be lost, the Junior Rangers set out to bring the satin bowerbird back to its bower. A pygmy hippo appears in the garden pond. The Junior Rangers hit the road to send the hippo home, but their journey is delayed by a sticky situation involving quicksand.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
programme.desc: This series follows a pony named Twilight Sparkle as she learns about friendship in the town of Ponyville with her friends.The ponies share adventures and help other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendship.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.sub-title: Take Romeo Off the Road - Mission: PJ Seeker
programme.desc: Join Catboy, Owlette and Gekko as the heroic trio goes into the night to save the day!

programme.sub-title: Splash, Dash, and Smash for the Crown! - Slowking's Crowning!
programme.desc: Some unusual events place our heroes among the wildest assortment of Trainers and Pokemon imaginable!

programme.title: Make It Count
programme.desc: Music swells with passion, moves the emotion. Maths is cool, clinical, methodical. One is fire, the other is ice. But did you know that Maths and Music are close cousins? Yes, Music relies on many Maths ideas.

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: OddBods
programme.desc: The OddBods return for a new season of fun and laughter!

programme.title: Chic & Cosy
programme.desc: Young couple Xiang Ting and Jia Hao want a forever home where they can live and work in - conducting voice lessons and doing math research and planning - and also accommodate future kids in years to come.

programme.title: Every Singaporean Son 3
programme.desc: Every Singaporean Son 3 (ESS3) is reality-based observationary documentary which mainly focuses on the Specialist Corps, showcasing their leadership as young and junior SAF commanders against the backdrop of the Basic Military Training (BMT).

programme.title: 128 Circle
programme.desc: The hawkers make a big promotional Mother's Day push for their delivery service which ends in chaos. Arun finds himself in a hole with his ailing business. Yi Kai is coerced into helping Audrey's father Henry keep a big secret, while Sherry reckons with a new feelings she has never felt.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Yorkshire: A Year in the Wild - The Dales and North York Moors National Parks cover 1400 square miles of wild and rugged Northern England. Separated by only 20 miles, they create a swath of wild Yorkshire stretching virtually from the east coast to the west.

However, once they learn of his return, the Beast Morpher Rangers jump back into action to stop him once-and-for all.

programme.title: Nancy Drew And The Hidden Staircase
programme.desc: A bit of an outsider struggling to fit into her new surroundings, Nancy and her pals set out to solve a mystery, make new friends, and establish their place in the community.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Chased by a vengeful criminal, the feds and a gang of otherworldly soldiers, an ex-con and his adopted teenage brother go on the run with a weapon of mysterious origin as their only protection.

programme.title: Day Of Reckoning
programme.desc: Fifteen years ago evil creatures from the underworld plagued the Earth with the intent of eliminating mankind. Dubbed the Day of Reckoning by survivors of the hellish holocaust, warriors of mankind again must battle the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Queen: Hungarian Rhapsody - Live In Budapest
programme.desc: On 27th July 1986, Queen performed the largest ever stadium concert at the Nepstadium in Budapest to a crowd of 80,000 ecstatic fans, this was also the first Western Rock concert in a stadium behind the Iron Curtain. The show held such significance to the Hungarian authorities that an unprecedented collaboration of the country's top film cameraman and technicians were formed to record it.

programme.title: Tok & Li
programme.sub-title: What if Fazli resorts to become a street salesman selling mops?
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Fazli has a good friend, Ah Teck, who earns a living as a street salesman. Ah Teck approaches Fazli asking him to take over his job for a few days as Ah Teck's wife-to-be, Janelle, is seeking for attention lately. Janelle who regards Ah Teck as a big time business man, complains he has been too busy recently. Fazli hesitates but Ah Teck lures him by promising a high commission. Excited, Fazli agrees.With microphone fixed onto him, Fazli enthusiastically sells mops and he manages to attract many buyers. One day Tok goes to the market and bumps into Fazli who is busy selling the mops. Fazli uses various languages and puts up an interesting showmanship. A big crowd begins to form. Tok is proud to see Fazli's success. However, his competitor, Robert, who sells the same stuff, gets jealous of Fazli. He plans to chase Fazli out of the area. Robert calls his friends to act like NEA officers.
